title: ISic003185. I.Sicily inscription 003185
body:
Facsimile Images

Εὐστάχι<ο>ς ἤ(τε) κὲ Βῶκυς
ἐκοιμήθη
εἰδοῖς Μαείες
σώφρων καὶ ἀκα-
5τάγνωστος ἔζησεν
ἔτη λε´
καὶ ἀνεπαύσατο

Apparatus criticus

Text after Lo Faro in Marchese 2012 ; ἤκε and Βῶκυς are written smaller and adjoins the ends of ll. 1-3. Lo Faro (2012) agrees with Agnello (1950-1951) that the smaller text is an addition to the main text and is meant to specify the name of the deceased (vel quidem Bochus or Bucco).

translation

commentary

bibliography

  • 04.0012 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Orsi 1923 no.11 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001699
  • Agnello 1950-1951 58-59 no.10 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002213
  • Ferrua 1989 no.273 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001995
  • Marchese 2012 119 no.55 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002550
